title: Aeroqual AQS 1 CAMP Monitoring at 250 Water Street
summary: Aeroqual aided Langan in maintaining compliance with the New York State Department of Environmental Conservation (DEC) and reassured the community during challenging remediation at 250 Water Street, a 1.1-acre brownfield in Manhattan's Seaport Historic District. Ten Aeroqual AQS 1 air quality stations integrated with Jerome analyzers monitored PM10, VOCs, mercury vapor, and wind data.
